column5: Im looking to buy a Vexilar FL8.Preferably a pro pack but the standard ice unit is good too.If anyone has 1 they want to sell or know somebody who does and doesnt want an arm and a leg for it ...please let me know!I have a pair of Hodgeman neoprophene waders($135.oo new) brand new for a partial trade+ cash if anyone is interested as well.Thanks and tight lines!!! John at [email protected]
